inn1.comm: starts off with a wayward delivery outside the off stump, certainly woke up Jones, ball runs down to third man and the batsmen cross over for a single.
short delivery, aimed at the rib-cage, Jayasuriya is bit late and gets hit, better line and length from Harmison
off the mark in style! short and wide outside the off stump and that's where he likes it best, massive cut and the ball screams away to the backward point fence
another wide, down the leg side on this occasion, Harmison struggling a bit here
good length delivery, shaping in a touch and Jayasuriya works it away towards square leg
on the middle and off stump line, forced away well wide of the fielder at cover
short rising delivery outside the off stump, bit of extra bounce there, Tharanga watchfully leaves it through to the keeper
another short delivery outside the off stump, Harmison getting the ball to kick-up nicely here, Tharanga leaves it through to the keeper, nice carry to the keeper
and the answer is NO, short wayward delivery down the leg side, Jayasuriya has a go at it but fails to make contact
left alone outside the off stump, better line and length
short of a good length delivery, pitched close to the off stump line and shaping away, Jayasuriya is beaten by the extra bounce and the late away movement, well bowled
again Plunkett drags it short, hint of away movement and Jayasuriya is beaten for the second time in a row
off the pads and the ball rolls down to fine leg, umpire Hair disallows the runs
another wide down the leg side!
line and length delivery, Jayasuriya on the back-foot defending, ball clips the inside edge and rolls away towards square leg
defended outside the off stump, watchfully played
down the leg side, Harmison under pressure here
slightly short and on the stump, bit of extra bounce and Jayasuriya is beaten on the forward prod, ball hits him on the box and rolls away towards short cover - that hurts
short of a good length delivery, drifting onto middle and leg and Tharanga works it away straight to the fielder at square leg
on the middle and leg stump line, once again the ball kicked-up after hitting the deck, Tharanga on the back-foot defending
another nasty delivery, this one kicked-up from a good length, Tharanga caught in two minds there, shapes up to duck and then fends it away towards gully
punched away off the back-foot to the cover region
short of a good length delivery, close to the off stump line, Jayasuriya leans back, makes room and cuts it away towards backward point

defended down towards covers and they scamper through for a single, Collingwood shy at the non-strikers's end misses the target by a long way and an extra run is added to the total - England bit touchy here
short delivery down the leg side, story of the day so far
and the saga continues, Plunkett is struggling to control the ball here, probably it's time to re-think the line of attack
finally a decent delivery, worked away towards midwicket
fuller length delivery outside the off stump, in the slot and Jayasuriya drills it through extra cover for his second boundary of the day, Sri Lanka off to a good start here
probing delivery, hint of swing and Jayasuriya is hit on the pad, appeal for lbw turned down, probably missing leg
defended down to mid-on, finally the over comes to an end after eight balls
edged away towards short third man and they scamper through for a single
on the pads, turned away straight to the fielder at short fine leg
short of a good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, Jayasuriya stands tall on the back-foot and defends it down awkwardly
drifting down the leg side, Jayasuriya fails to make contact but the ball clips the pad and rolls down to fine leg
short of a good length delivery on the middle and leg stump line, Jayasuriya hops into position and tucks it away towards square leg
another wide, bit of a harsh call this - width offered outside the off stump and Jayasuriya has a go at it, missed it by miles

Harmison strikes! another short and wide delivery outside the off stump, hint of swing - once again Jayasuriya is tempted to go after it, ball kisses the outside edge and flies straight to Jones behind the stumps, big wicket that
down the leg side
driven back to the bowler, sweelty timed but ...
defended down on the leg side and they steal a single
good length delivery, this one nipeed back in a touch, Jayawardene quickly gets into a good position and works it away towards midwicket
good length delivery outside the off stump, nicely looking drive and he finds the hole between the cover fielders
short rising delivery, close to the off stump line and Tharanga leaves it through to the keeper, hope Jayasuriya is watching
good length delivery, again pitched close to the off stump line, Tharanga is sucked into the drive, ball clips the inside edge and crashes into the pad, much better over from Plunkett
Harmison drifts onto the pads and Jayawardene tucks it away towards short fine leg
better line and length, left alone outside the off stump
short of a good length delivery, nipping back in, Jayawardene goes for the flick but fails to make contact, ball hits him on the stomach and rolls away towards short cover - quick single taken

short rising delivery down the leg side, Tharanga looking to work it away fine fails to connect, ball clips the thigh pad and goes straight to the keeper, loud appeal for caught behind turned down by umpire Llong and rightly so
short and angling across the left-hander, no shot offered
wayward delivery outside the off stump, Harmison pitched it wide and the slope here at Lord's did the rest
short of a good length delivery, bowled from round the stumps and coming in with the angle, Tharanga is troubled by the extra bounce and the ball rolls away off the outside edge
on the pads, nudged down to fine leg for an easy single

good length delivery, Jayawardene gets left foot across and goes for the drive but fails to make contact, ball clips the pad and rolls away on the leg side, Jayawardene calls for the single but Tharanga is not interested
defended outside the off stump
worked away towards square leg, Mahamood there fails to stop it cleanly and the batsmen scamper back for the second
again worked away well wide of Mahmood, this time just a single
short rising delivery, Tharanga gets right on top of the bounce and defends it down on the off side, early call and they scamper through for a single - excellent cricket this from the young man

good length delivery outside the off stump, pitched close to the off stump line and coming in with the angle, Tharanga quickly sizes up the length and hits through the line, sweetly timed drive and the ball races away to the cover fence
short delivery, again anlged in, Tharnaga gets behind the line and defends it down watchfully
drops it on the off side and the steal a single, excellent running between the wickets
good length delivery on the middle and leg stump line, worked away through the vacant square leg region for an easy single

four more! short and wide outside the off stump, a dream-delivery if you are a batsman, Tharanga goes back and across, stands tall and chops it down to the third man fence - excellent timing and placement, fielder in the deep had no chance whatsoever
defended on the back-foot and the ball rolls away on the off side, once again the calling is perfect and a quick single is added to the total
hint of swing and Tharanaga is hit on the pad, appeal for lbw turned down, excellent delivery first up
driven away towards mid-off
another line and length delivery, defended on the back-foot
cut away off the back-foot, not a well timed shot and the ball rolls away towards point
left alone outside the off stump, impressive over so far from Bresnan
off the pads and the ball rolls away towards short fine leg, end of a good first over from the bebutant
starts off with a good length delivery on the stumps, Tharanga gets behind the line and defends it down
you too Mahamood! wayward delivery down the leg side, rightly called a wide
worked away straight to the fielder at square leg
Tharanga continues to impress! short of a good length delivery, angling across a bit, Tharanga gets under the bouncer and SQUARE DRIVES it over the point fielder, good clean hit
take that! good length delivery outside the off stump, hint of swing, Tharanga pushes forward and creams it through the gap between cover and mid-off , once again the timing and placement was spot on
another good looking drive, but this time the ball goes straight to the fielder at point
round the wicket to the left-hander, good length delivery outside the off stump and the edge is produced but the slips are missing - cricket!
drifting down the leg side, that's wide number 13
and he continues on his merry way! short and wide outside the off stump, in the slot and Tharanga just waves it away as if it was a fly, this is attacking batting at its best
defended down on the on side, quick single taken
short and wide outside the off stump, close to a wide but Bresnan gets away with it
turned away to fine leg for a single
defended back to the bowler
drifting onto the pads and Tharanga flicks it away to the fine leg fence, easy pickings
edged away towards third man
extras continues to mount! good length delivery outside the off stump, bowled from round the stumps, Tharanga lofts it over the cover fielder, made it look easy
four more! England bowlers wilting under pressure here - width offered outside the off stump and Tharanga cuts it away through point for the second boundary of the over, Sri Lanka off to a flier here
defended outside the off stump
good length delivery outside the off stump, Tharanga goes for the drive, ball clips the outside edge and rolls away towards third man
driven straight to the fielder at mid-off
driven well wide of the fielder at mid-on

starts off a fresh over with a fresh wide, short and way outside the off stump, Jayawardene comes down the track and has a go at it but fails to make contact - umpire Hair has certainly lost couple of pounds since the match started
short of a good length delivery, coming in with the angle, Jayawardene goes for the pull but the shot is not timed properly, ball clips the bottom half of the bat and goes straight into the track
edged down to third man, ball goes wide of the fielder in the deep and they scamper back for the second
driven straight to the fielder at point
good length delivery outside the off stump, forced away towards cover point
swing and a miss outside the off stump, was there to be hit but Jayawardene miserably failed to make contact
and again, another juicy delivery outside the off stump but Jayawardene mises out
good length delivery, bowled from round the stumps and drifting onto middle and leg, Tharanga stays back and clips it away through square leg

fifty! let me make it bit more easy for you?! short and wide outside the off stump, in the slot to be murdered and Tharanga brings up his half-century by clobbering it to the point fence - what an innings
drops it down on the off side and they steal a single
driven away towards cover, Struass fails to stop it cleanly and an extra run is added to the total, everybody doing their bit here
turned away off the back-foot to the square leg region
goodness me! short of a good length delivery down the leg side, do we have spare umpires?
we will be surely needing one! Harmison adds one more to the list, for a change outside the off stump on this occasion
finally! good length delivery outside the off stump, hint of swing and Jayawardene leaves it through to the keeper, that's a rarity!
turned away off the pads to the square leg region
short ball and moving away outside off stump, batsman nicely over it and runs down to thirdman
swinging down the legside and one more wide to the list
short of length ball outside off stump, batsman slices it away to thirdman
good length ball just outside off stump, batsman moves forward and defends with an angled bat, runs down to thirdman
swinging into the legstump, turned away through mid-wicket
pushed back to the bowler
flighted ball on the stumps, batsman charges down the track but not to the pitch of the ball, defends it away
full length ball outside off stump, driven to sweeper cover
fraction short on the off stump, turning away, batsman defends it away on the back-foot wide of the short thirdman fielder
full length ball outside leg stump, batsman goes for the sweep but ball strikes the pads and runs away fine to the fence
driven to cover point
short of length ball outside off stump, batsman goes for the cut and gets beaten, ther was an appeal for caught-behind
on the pads, turned away behind square for an easy single
good length ball on the off stump, driven down the ground to long-off
short of length ball delivery just outside off stump, batsman goes for the cut and gets beaten, was too close to cut
full length ball on the off stump, batsman drives with full face of the bat down to long-on
flighted and full on the off stump, batsman moves forward and drives to long-off
length ball outside off stump, batsman sweeps it away to deep square leg region
driven straight to the cover fielder

Stumping missed! flighted ball on the leg stump, turning away, batsman moves forward and tries to drive through offside, beaten by the flight and drags his foot outside with the shot, Jones fumbles and misses the stumping
full length ball on the off stump, driven to long-off
good length ball on the off stump, defended on the front-foot to offside
short of length ball and swinging in, batsman tries to push through offside but gets at the inside half of the bat, ball rolls back to the bowler
given width outside off stump, batsman moves forward and square drives but straight to point fielder
length ball on the stumps, batsman turns it away to mid-wicket, Tharanga failing to pick the gaps
pitched up on the off stump, again driven straight to the cover fielder
driven straight to the cover again, maiden over from Collingwood!
flighted ball outside off stump, batsman sweeps it away to deep square leg
full length ball outside leg stump, batsman fails to put it away, sweeps hard but straight to short-fine leg fielder
short of length ball and turning away, batsman cuts it away on the back-foot to point
down the leg stump, too full, batsman sweeps and gets the bottom edge, ball rolls down fine and they take an easy single
turned away on the back-foot to short-fine leg
Max! Great shot form the captain- flighted delivery outside off stump, Jayawardene just comes down the track and swings it away high and over the mid-wicket fence
full length ball outside off stump, batsman drives it away to sweeper cover
good length ball around the off stump, batsman drives it away straight to the point fielder

Two down! slower delivcery on the middle and leg stump, Jayawardene picks it up and tries to loft over the fielder at mid-off, completely mistimes it and ends up hitting in the air, simple catch to Strauss at mid-off, excellent change of pace from Collingwood does the trick!
defended on the front-foot to offside
good length ball on the off stump, batsman tries to defend but is beaten by the change of pace once again
full length ball on the off stump, driven to long-off and keeps the strike
good length ball on the off stump, coming in with the angle, defended away to mid-wicket
full length ball outside off stump, batsman drives it away on the front-foot through cover-point, excellent placement this time from Tharanga
full length ball on the off stump, driven to long-off and keeps the strike
good length ball around the off stump, defended on the front-foot back to the bowler
on the pads, batsman tries to glance but misses and gets on the pads
swinging down the legide
good length ball around the off stump, batsman defends it away to cover
full length ball outside off stump, batsman drives it away to sweeper cover
defended on the front-foot to offside
short and wide outside off stump, batsman moves back and cuts it away over the point fielder, ball races away to the fence, no chance for the wide thirdman fielder
defended on the front-foot to cover
good length ball outside off stump, coming in, defended
defended away to cover, just 5 runs in this over
good length ball on the off stump, coming in with the angle, defended on the front-foot to cover
short of length ball, defended on the back-foot down the wicket
good length ball just outside off stump, batsman drives it away wide of the point fielder
driven on the front-foot straight to cover
turned away wide of the mid-wicket fielder and takes an easy single
full length ball outside off stump, driven to deep cover
defended on the front-foot back to the bowler
full length ball on the stumps, batsman drives it back, half-stop from the bowler and they take a single at mid-on
defended on the front-foot to offside
good length ball on the off stump, Sangakkara defends on the front-foot to offside
fraction short on the middle and off stump, cutting away, batsman pushes it away on the back-foot to point
short and high wide outside off stump and the wides tally go upto 18
turned away on the back-foot straight to mid-wicket
fraction short on the middle and leg stump, batsman picks the length quickly and flicks it away to deep mid-wicket region but ball doesnt reach the fence
good length ball but given width outside off stump to free his arms, Sangakkara moves forward and square drives behind point, ball races away to the fence
good length ball just outside off stump, cutting away, batsman tries to drive on the up and gets beaten
short ball just outside off stump, coming in with the angle, defended with an angled bat wide of the point fielder
short outside off stump, batsman tries to force it away on the back-foot but misses it by the away movement
short ball just outside off stump, batsman nicely top of it and runs down to thirdman
Just a single! good length ball outside off stump, driven to sweeper cover
good length ball on the middle stump, nipping away, batsman moves forward and just drops it to mid-off and takes a quick single

good length ball on the off stump, Tharanga drops it front of point, takes off for a single and changes his mind, Sangakkara is stranded half-way down the track, Collingwood fires in the throw at the bowler's end and Mahmood does the rest
defended on the back-foot to offside
bouncer on the off stump, Tharanga ducks underneath
full length ball on the off stump, batsman drives it away wide of the cover fielder
short ball on the off stump, batsman moves back and forces it away wide of the point fielder
short of length ball and turning in, worked away behind square
fraction short outside off stump, batsman cuts it away to deep cover
flighted and full outside off stump, batsman slams on the front-foot to deep cover
down the legside, batsman sweeps and misses
driven straight to cover on the front-foot
length ball on the legs, swept away to deep square leg
fraction short outside off stump, Dilshan nudges it away to short-thirdman
good length ball on the middle and leg stump, pushed wide of the mid-on fielder
pitched up on the stumps, batsman drives it away wide of the mid-off fielder
short ball banged in, batsman rocks back and pulls it away to deep square leg
on the pads, glanced away to deep square leg fielder
slower ball outside off stump, Dilshan tries to cut off the back-foot but mistimes it, ball rolls to point
fraction short outside off stump, nipping in, Dilshan goes for his favourite cut and misses it
flighted and full ball, batsman drives it away nicely and wide of the deep cover fielder for a couple of runs
length ball outside leg stump, batsman sweeps it away fine, Bell does the chase and keeps them within two runs
tossed up on the off stump, driven on the front-foot to point and scampers through a single
short of length ball and turning in, batsman moves back and turns it away to square leg, runs hard and they complete two runs
turned away in front of square and this time only a single
length ball on the middle and leg stump, defended on the front-foot to onside and they take another single
bouncer from Mahmood to start the over, batsman ducks underneath
one more bouncer, this time Tharanga caught in two minds to pull or not, he ducks initially and then goes for the pull, nowhere near it and gets beaten
short ball on the middle stump, coming in, defended back to the bowler
good length ball on the off stump, pushed on the front-foot to mid-off
short ball banged in again, on the leg stump, this time not much of bounce, batsman goes for the pull and gets the edge, ball flies finer and runs away to the fence
slower delivery outside leg stump, batsman goes for the sweep and gets on the pads
driven on the front-foot to cover
good length ball and swinging away. batsman reaches for it and mistimes the drive, ball rolls away to cover
pitched up on the off stump, driven wide of the mid-off fielder
full length ball on the middle stump, swinging in lately, Tharanga adjusts well and pushes back to the bowler
short of length ball outside off stump, batsman cuts it away wide of the thirdman fielder, good running between the wickets
length ball on the off stump, drops it on the front-foot and scampers through a single
slower ball on the off stump, batsman sweeps and gets the top edge but falls safe at fine leg region
defended on the front-foot to cover point and once more a quick single taken
short ball on the off stump, Dilshan pulls it away wide of the mid-on fielder

Excellent catch! short ball outside off stump, nipping in a bit, Dilshan picks up the length quickly and cuts hard but fails to keep it down, Collingwood at backward point dives to his right and takes a stunner
on the leg stump, turned away in front of square
short of length ball outside off stump, batsman stands tall and tries to drive, gets beaten by the away movement
fuller length ball on the stumps, driven to mid-off
good length ball swinging in, batsman tries to defend on the front-foot and gets an inside edge to onside
good length ball on the off stump, Arnold moves forward and defends it away to cover
Collingwood keeping the ball on the length, Arnold tries to push it away but hits straight to the cover fielder
pushed to the point fielder, Arnold failing to rotate the strike
length ball outside off stump, batsman steers it away to thirdman this time and gets off the strike
pushed on the front-foot to cover
worked away off the hips to the square leg region
driven wide of the fielder at mid-on
driven straight to the fielder at point
defended down into the track and they steal a single
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, Tharanga on the back-foot defending and the ball rolls away towards point
good length delivery outside the off stump, off-cutter bowled from round the wicket, Tharanga gets forward and drives it away straight to the fielder at point
good length delivery on the pads, worked away towards square leg
angling across the left-hander, punched wide of the fielder at cover
good length delivery, Collingwood keeping it wicket to wicket
steered down to third man for a single
eased away on the off side
short and angling across, cut away to third man for yet another easy single

short of a good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, Arnold leans back and steers it down to third man for a single, nicely opened the face of the bat at the point of impact and got the placement right
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, Tharanga has a half-hearted poke at it and the ball zips past the outside edge
again slightly short and close to the off stump line, Tharanga too nicely opens the face of the bat and dabs it down to third man for a single

lucky runs! short of a good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, Tharanga is cramped for room but he goes for the cut, ball clips the inside edge and races away to the vacant fine leg fence
width offered outside the off stump but Tharanga fails to capitalise
worked away through midwicket and the single taken Tharanga to 99!
good length delivery, pitched in line and angling across, Tharanga gets across and drives it away straight to the fielder at cover
there it is! short of a good length delivery, again pitched in-line and angling across, Tharanga leans back a bit and steers it down to third man and that's his 3rd ODI hundred, way to go

and that's the end of that! short of a good length delivery, pitched touch outside the off stump and shaping in ever-so-slightly, Arnold  looking to steer it down to third man ends up with a faint edge and Jones holds on well to a hard chance.
driven back to the bowler
goes for an expansive drive and gets beaten
defended towards cover
good length delivery outside the off stump, driven well wide of the cover fielder
good length delivery, this one nipped back in a touch and Kapugedera is made to defend, well bowled Plunkett
another decent delivery outside the off stump, Kapugedera moves across a bit and punches it away well wide of the fielder at cover, easy single and he is off the mark
on the pads and Tharanga works it away behind square on the leg side

another one bites the dust! short delivery on the stumps, a fairly innocuous delivery, Kapugedera needlessly goes after it, ball clips the top-edge and steeples down to backward square leg, Pietersen manning the boundary there runs across to his right, times his dive to perfection and comes up with a stunning acrobatic catch, Sri Lanka six down
defended down on the off side
driven wide of the cover fielder, Vaas off the mark first ball
turned away to deep square leg for a brace
on the stumps, Collingwood squeezing  it in here, Tharanga ends up driving it back to the bowler
good length delivery outside the off stump, again no width offered, Tharanga waits for the ball and at the last moment nudges it down to third man for a single
driven away in the air to the cover region, Strauss there dives forward but the ball falls painfully short
fuller length delivery, defended straight to the man at point&
good length delivery outside the off stump, driven straight to Collingwood at point, suddenly the gaps are missing!
good length delivery, angled across the left-hander, Tharanga gets back and across and plays it down on the off side, nicely looking touch shot and they scamper through for a single
beaten outside the off stump
worked away off the pads to the square leg region
again tucked away off the pads to the square leg region for an easy single
good length delivery outside the off stump and Vaas strokes it past the fielder at cover
good length delivery down the leg side and Vaas helps it down to fine leg for an easy single
good length delivery on the middle and leg stump line, hint of swing, not sure if its reversing, Tharanga covers the line and drives well but fails to get it past the fielder at midwicket
wicket to wicket delivery and Tharanga drives it down to long-off for a single
fuller length delivery, was in the slot but Vaas ends up driving it back to the bowler
turned away through the vacant square leg region for a single
driven straight to the England captain at cover
good length delivery, bowled from round the stumps and coming in with the angle, Tharanga is cramped for room and he is made to play straight

good length delivery, again close to the off stump line, Tharanga goes back and across and glides it down to third man for a single, Harmison looking much better now, finally he is hitting the right line and length.
drags it in short, an excellent effort ball, bit of a surprise delivery and Tharanga ducks under it

good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, Tharanga looking to work it away on the leg side edge up with a thick edge and the ball rolls away towards point - this is turning out to be another good over for England
driven straight to the cover fielder
good length delivery, driven down to long-off for a single
on the middle and leg stump line, turned away through square leg for a single
the ghost returns! short of a good length delivery, bowled from round the stumps and angled down the leg side, Vaas has a poke at it but fails to connect
on the middle and off stump line, punched well wide of the fielder at mid-on and they scamper through for a single
slightly short and bit wide outside the off stump, Tharanga quick goes back and jabs it down to third man for a single
driven wide of the fielder at mid-off, again just a single
bouncer and Tharanga ducks under it, well bowled Plunkett
turned away straight to the fielder at midwicket
short ball, pitched wide outside the off stump and coming in with the angle, Vaas gets right on top of the bounce and pulls it away to deep midwicket for a brace
Harmison once again drags it short and this time Vaas is trapped - ugly looking pull shot and the ball balloons up towards midwicket, Strauss calls for it and nicely settles under it
short rising delivery outside the off stump, Tharanga has a wild slash at it, missed the target by miles there
fuller length delivery on the stumps, Plunkett probably looking for some reverse swing there, Tharanga gets behind the line and drives it wide of the fielder at mid-on
wayward delivery down the leg side and the extras tally moves up to 35! atrocious to say the least!
swing and a miss outside the off stump
driven through cover point for a single
short of a good length delivery and Malinga pulls it down to fine leg for a single, the ball was in the air for a long time but fell well short of Harmison moving in from the deep
another short ball, pulled away to long-leg for a single
Mahmood for the third time in a row drags it short, Malinga swings across but fails to connect
down to earth, good length delivery outside the off stump, Malinga stays back and punches it away through cover for a single
eased away on the off side
short ball on the pads, Malinga on the back-foot pulling, misses the target by a long way and gets hit on the stomach
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, Malinga has another wild swing at it and as unusual the ball goes through the keeper
England continues to contribute generously! another wide, this time called for height

bowled'm! a harmless good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, Malinga makes room and has a go at it, not sure what he was aiming there, anyway he misses the target by a country mile and the ball crashes into the woodwork - Sri Lanka eight down
fuller length delivery outside the off stump, hint of reverse swing and Fernando is beaten outside the off stump
another fuller length delivery outside the off stump, this time Fernando gets some bat on it and the ball rolls down to third man
a four! short delivery, this one nipped back in a touch, Tharanga pulls and pulls well, ball comfortably clears Harmison at mid-on and races away to the fence
yorker length delivery outside the off stump and Tharanga is beaten all ends up
short delivery, Fernando on the back-foot defending, ball clips the outside edge and runs down to the third man boundary, welcome runs for Sri Lanka
defended down to silly mid-on and they scamper through for a single, Harmison's shy at the bowler's end misses the target and Fernando makes it across safely
top edge and the ball balloons down to fine leg

short ball, pitched outside the off stump and cutting in, Tharanga goes for the pull and once fails to connect properly, ball clips the top-edge and lobs up towards midwicket, easy catch held and a massive innings come to an end
swung away to deep midwicket, easy single to end the over
short of a good length delivery, Fernando pulls but fails to make contact
good length delivery outside the off stump, Fernando pushes forward and lofts it over the fielder at cover, not in full control there, just managed to clear the fielder
another short delivery, pulled away to midwicket for a single, another mis-timed shot
short delivery down the leg side, rightly called a wide
short ball outside the off stump, Murali does his ritual and the ball goes through to the keeper

another swing and a miss, ball goes through to the keeper, Fernando is half way down the track but Murali was still swinging, Jones hits the striker's end stumps and rolls towards  the bowler, that is when Murlai decided to have a go, this time Bresnan misses the stumps at the bowler's and the ball races away towards long-on and fianlly after all the drama two runs are added to the total

called for overstepping, Murali with the usual swing and a miss, Fernando once again takes off for a single but Murali stands his ground, over head throw back to the bowler and that gives Fernando enough time to make it back safely
good length delivery outside the off stump, yep you gussed it right - another swing and a missing, this time Jones fails to collect it properly

inn2.comm: short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, hint of shape away and Trescothink leaves it through to the keeper
good length delivery, pitched close to the off stump line and shaping away late, Trescothick shuffles across, gets behind the line and defends it down on the off side

slightly short and shaping away, Trescothick waits for the ball and at the last possible moment runs it down well wide of the fielder at first slip, deliberate shot and he placed it to perfection - off the mark in style
left alone outside the off stump
good length delivery outside the off stump, driven well wide of the fielder at cover
fuller length delivery outside the off stump, Trescothick is drawn forward and the edge is produced, ball races away to third man and the batsmen stroll across for a single
good length delivery outside the off stump, defended towards cover
good length delivery, bowled with a round arm action and the ball just skidded across the surface, Trescothick beaten for pace there - ball zips past the outside edge and goes through to the keeper
good length delivery outside the off stump, Trescothick gets behind the line and strokes it away towards cover
good length delivery, angled across the left-hander and Trescothick steers it down to third man for a single, bit of edge involved there
good length delivery outside the off stump, width offered and Strauss nicley glides it down to third man, off the mark with an easy single
short of a good length delivery, close to the off stump line and Trescothick defends it away towards cover, Malinga starts off with a decent over

good length delivery outside the off stump, Vaas getting the ball to shape away from the left-hander, Strauss moves across a bit and drives it straight to the fielder at cover, powerful shot but the placement was poor
line and length delivery outside the off stump, forced away towards cover
bit of width offered outside the off stump but once again Strauss fails to gets it past the fielder at cover

good length delivery outside the off stump, this time a touch closer to the off stump line, Strauss nicely gets behind the line and drives it away through the gap between the cover fielders. long chase from Fernando saves one run
turned away straight to the fielder at midwicket
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, hint of away swing and Trescothick leaves it through to the keeper
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, defended standing tall on the back-foot
again slightly short and on the middle and off stump line, Strauss on the back-foot defending, ball clips the inner half of the bat and rolls away on the leg side

short of a good length delivery, pitched close to the off stump line and angling across, Strauss stands tall on the back-foot and punches it away through the gap between point and cover, nice looking shot that
short rising delivery, no width offered but Trescothick goes for the cut and the ball zips past the outside edge, beaten by the extra bounce there
punched away towards cover

short of a good length delivery, again pitched close to the off stump line, Trescothick gives himself a bit of room outside the leg stump and jabs it down to third man for a single - dangerous short for just a single
Vaas hits the channel outside the off stump, Trescothick drives off the back-foot and finds the fielder at cover
good length delivery on the middle and leg stump line, this one just came in with the angle, Trescothick picks it up early, gets right behind the line and taps it down to mid-on
slightly short and close to the off stump line, hint of away swing, Trescothick quickly gets into a good position and steers it down to third man for a single, living on the edge here

bit of width offered outside the off stump, a rare bad delivery from Vaas, Strauss lines it up and square drives it towards backward point, Dilshan there moves across quickly, flings himself to the right and cuts off a certain boundary - amazing effort
eased away towards cover
this one shaped in a bit, Strauss is beaten and the ball crashes into the pad
defended on the back-foot
dropped! well disguised slower delivery and Strauss is foxed into driving on the up, ball shoots straight back but Malinga fails to hold on to a fairly hard chance
worked away off the pads and the ball goes straight to the fielder at square leg
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, Trescothick goes for the cut but fails to connect. that was a rash shot
and again! was there to be cut but Trescothick missed it by miles
on the stumps, defended on the back-foot and the ball rolls away towards point
punched away well wide of the fielder at mid-off and they scamper through for a single

shot! good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, shaping away, Trescothick pushes forward and clips it away through midwicket, got the placement right and once past the fielder the ball just raced away to the fence
comes down the track, looking to drive on the up, ball clips the inner half of the bat, thuds into the track and bounces over the bowler
good length delivery outside the off stump, Strauss comes down the track and hammers away through covers for the second boundary of the over
turned away well wide of the fielder at midwicket, easy single - England moving along nicely here
even better! good length delivery outside the off stump, Trescothick goes for the lofts drive and gets it past the fielder at mid-off, end of an expensive over from Vaas
driven off the back-foot and gets it wide of the fielder at mid-off
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, Trescothick swings across the line but fails to connect
line and length delivery, Trescothick on the back-foot defending, ball rolls away towards cover
forced away towars point
good length delivery, close to the off stump line, Trescothick drives straight but fails to get it past the bowler, probably came off the inner half of the bat
comes down the track and strokes it away towards cover

and he strikes first ball! short of a good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, for a change the ball kept a touch low after hitting the deck, Strauss swings across the line and is beaten by the lack of bounce, ball clips the bottom edge and goes behind, Sangakkara dives across to his right and takes a good low catch. England one down
good delivery first up, defended on the back-foot and the ball rolls back along the carpet
half-volley outside the off stump and Bell drives it past the fielder at cover
bouncer down the leg side
line and length delivery, defended on the back-foot and the ball rolls away on the leg side

low fulltoss outside the off stump, probably the slower ball gone wrong, Bell taps it away towards square leg, Trescothick takes off for a single and gets stranded but Kapugedera's thorw at the bowler's end fails to hit the target and the ball races away to the fence
flicked away in the air to the square leg region, Kapugedera cuts off a certain boundary, diving away to this right
defended down on the off side
worked away well wide of the fielder at mid-on
tucked away towards midwicket, quick single taken
short and wide outside the off stump and that's where Trescothick likes it best, massive chop and the ball screams away to the backward point fence, try stopping that
punched away towards cover, no room for a single there
short of a good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, Trescothick reads it well and taps it away behind the stumps on the off side
good length delivery outside the off stump, Bell pushes forward and drives it away straight to the fielder at cover
short rising delivery, angled in from wide outside the off stump - Fernando mixing it up nicely here, Bell stands tall on the back-foot and defends it down on the off side, well played in the end

got'm! short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, nipped in a touch, apart from that it was a fairly harmless delivery, Bell drives away from his body, ball clips the inside edge and crashes into the stumps - England two down and in a spot of bother here
fuller length delivery outside the off stump, Pietersen needlessly goes after it and  gets beaten by a long way
fuller length delivery, drifting down the leg side and Pietersen takes full toll, nice looking flick and the ball races away to the fine leg fence, off the mark in style
off the pads and the ball rolls away towards short fine leg
on the middle and leg stump line, cutting in nicely, Pietersen fails to make contact and the ball rolls away off the pad
change of ends for Vaas, good length delivery outside the off stump, driven straight to the cover fielder
angled into the pad, Trescothick goes for the flick but fails to make contact, ball clips the pad and rolls away on the leg side
good length delivery, defended on the back-foot
good length delivery outside the off stump, Trescothick looking to glide it down to third man ends up with a thick edge and the ball rolls down to third man.
defended on the back-foot
nicely steered down to third man for a single
short of a good length delivery, close to the off stump line, Trescothick leans back, makes room and jabs it down to third man for a single

good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, hint of swing, Trescothick gets behind the line and strokes it just wide of the fielder at cover, early call and they scamper through for a single
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, Pietersen comes down hard on it, not a well timed shot but the ball finds the gap between cover and mid-off

short of a good length delivery, this one jagged back in shaprly after hitting the deck, Pietersen looking to clip it away through midwicket is beaten all ends up the ball bounces over the stumps, Sangakkara dives across to his left and cuts off a certain boundary
turned away towards midwicket
bouncer on the middle and leg stump line, Fernando working up good pace here, Trescothick comfortably ducks under it
good length delivery, angling across the right-hander, Pietersen steps forward and across and drives hard, not a well timed shot but the ball rolls away wide of the fielder at mid-off
short of a good length delivery, no real width there, Trescothick stays back and glides it down to third man
good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, defended on the front-foot
on the middle and leg stump line, Pietersen gets forward and punch drives it down to mid-on, once again the shot is not well timed and the ball rolled away off the inner half of the bat
good length delivery, angled across the right-hander, Pietersen strokes it away towards cover point
driven off the front-foot and the ball goes wide of the fielder at cover

low fulltoss outside the off stump, Pietersen steps forward and jabs it down to mid-on, quick single called for, Malinga fails to hit the stumps at the bowler's end and Pietersen makes it across safely, direct hit would have been interesting
fuller length delivery outside the off stump, Trescothick comes down the track and slices it away straight to the fielder at point
shot! good length delivery outside the off stump, a realy jaw-dropper from Fernando, Trescothick comes down hard on the ball, up and over the cover fielder she goes - no stopping that
much better line and length, defended on the front-foot
forced away on the off side
on the pads, Trescothick looking to flick it away fails to connect and the ball rolls away off the pad

good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, Pietersen walks across and flicks it away in the air towards the midwicket region, Jayawardene there times his jump to perfection and plucks it out of thin air, an amazing one-handed effort
defended outside the off stump
pushed forward and defends it back to the bowler
driven away off the back-foot to the cover region, Arnold dives across to his right and saves runs
good length delivery outside the off stump, defended
beaten outside the off stump, end of a successful over
slower and full ball on the pads, ball takes off the pads and rolls away to onside
bouncer directed well, batsman ducks underneath

short of length delivery just outside off stump, nipping in off the wicket, Collingwood moves back to defend and is beaten for pace, ball hits him on the knee roll and he is trapped plumb in front, Collingwood beaten by the sharp movement and also by pace
defended on the front-foot to offside
short of length ball on the off stump, defended on the back-foot
full length ball down the legside, batsman flicks it away finer and ball races away to the fence
full length ball on the pads, batsman fails to put it away, gets hit on the pads
defended on the back-foot to offside
short of length ball on the off stump, batsman defends it to silly point. Sangakkara flicks it back to the stumps, overthrow and a single taken
fraction short outside off stump, batsman cuts it away to thirdman region
defended on the front-foot to mid-on
on the pads, batsman flicks but gets on the pads, ball rolls away to short-thirdman, overthrow again and they take two runs, sloppy fielding from the Lankans!
flighted ball outside off stump, batsman offers no stroke
this time on the off stump, batsman sweeps it away to deep square leg
doosra on the off stump, batsman moves forward and chips it across the line to deep mid-wicket for a couple of runs
tossed up on the leg stump, batsman defends on the front-foot
fraction short on the pads, batsman glances it away to short-fine leg
full length ball on the middle and leg stump, batsman drives wide of the fielder at mid-on, Arnold chases and keeps them within a single
on the pads, glanced away to deep square leg
good length ball angled away outside off stump, batsman lets it go
length ball outside off stump, batsman nicely glides it away to thirdman
short of length ball on the off stump, nipping in, batsman tries to defend with an open face, gets an inside edge onto the pads and ball rolls away to thirdman
good length ball on the stumps, batsman defends it back to the bowler
short of length ball just outside off stump, punched away to point
fraction short on the off stump, doosra, Trescothick pushes on the back-foot to offside
flighted ball on the off stump, pushed away to cover
good length ball on the off stump, defended on the front-foot to offside
flighted ball, batsman goes for the sweep but it was too wide outside off stump, fails to connect and gets beaten
flighted doosra just outside off stump, batsman drives on the up to long-off
short of length ball and turning in, defended on the back-foot to onside
short ball on the stumps, angled in, punched on the back-foot to long-on
short ball just outside off stump, batsman very cautious and just taps it away to cover point
length ball on the stumps, batsman drives on the up to long-on
good length ball on the off stump, defended on the front-foot to offside
punched off the back-foot but straight to Jayawardene at covers
defended on the front-foot to cover, Trescothick looks for a singel but Jayawardene was quick to the ball
pushed back to the bowler
flighted ball on the off stump, swept away to deep square leg
doosra on the off stump, batsman moves forward and nicely plays it away to vacant point region
full length ball on the stumps, driven through mid-wicket for a couple of runs. good shot played against the turn
tossed up, batsman comes down the track and drives to deep mid-wicket
length ball on the off stump, swept away to deep square leg
pushed away on the back-foot wide of the cover fielder
full length ball on the off stump, batsman drives it away to long-off
good length ball on the off stump, pushed back to the bowler
this time bit outside off stump, batsman pushes on the front-foot to deep point, Malinga quick but good running and they complete two runs
fraction short outside off stump, batsman punches it away wide of the deep cover fielder

flighted ball on the middle and off stump, Trescothick comes down the track and covers the spin, lofts it away over the mid-wicket fielder, couple of bounces into the fence, reaches his fifty in style
off the pads and ball rolls to onside
flighted and full on the off stump, driven to long-off
fraction short outside off stump and turning in, batsman punches on the back-foot through covers
on the pads, glanced away to deep backward square leg
short ball and turning in, batsman back and across, turns it away behind square
flighted ball outside leg stump, batsman goes for the sweep and gets an under edge to onside
good length ball on the middle and leg stump, defended on the front-foot to cover
slightly short on the pads, glanced away behind square

Stumping missed! flighted ball just outside off stump, turning in nicely, Trescothick charges down the track and tries to on-drive on the up, ball slips in through the gap, Sangakkara fails to collect cleanly and misses a chance
length ball on the off stump, swept away to deep square leg
defended on the back-foot to point
length ball on the middle stump, turnng away from Trescothick, batsman beaten on the back-foot
tossed up, swept away to deep square leg
good length ball outside off stump, defende on the front-foot to cover
defended on the front-foot to onside
good length ball on the middle stump, doosra, batsman goes for the sweep and misses, ball strikes the pads and a loud shout turned down by Llong, very close call!
doosra again, batsman fails to pick it up, tries to defend and gets on the pads
defended on the front-foot back to the bowler
short ball outside off stump, given width to free his arms, batsman cuts it away behind point for a couple of runs
defended on the back-foot to point
full length ball on the middle and leg stump, driven to long-on
flat delivery and drifting down the legside, batsman glances away fine for a couple of runs
Good shot! fraction short outside off stump, batsman quick to pick the length, rocks back and cuts hard to the point fence
pushed on the back-foot down the wicket
flighted ball outside leg stump, batsman uses his feet and drives it away to deep mid-wicket
defended on the front-foot to onside
doosra on the off stump, batsman beaten and ball clips the thigh, runs away to short-thirdman, appeal from Sangakkara but was stuck outside off stump
on the pads, glanced away to deep square leg
doosra on the stumps, batsman sweeps it away to deep square leg
angled into the pads, worked away on the back-foot behind square
Max! length ball just outside off stump, Trescothick goes down on one knee and lofts it superbly high and over the mid-wicket fence, excellent timing!
driven back to the bowler
full length ball outside off stump, batsman drives it away to deep cover
driven on the front-foot to long-on, very good over for England fetching 9 runs!
good length ball around the off stump, nipping in, batsman defends and gets an inside edge onto the pads
half-volley outside off stump, batsman fails to pick the gap, drives it straight to the cover fielder
short ball outside off stump, nipping in, batsman moves back and nicely opens the face, runs it down fine to thirdman fence
full length ball swinging into the pads, batsman gets his bat down in time, puts it away to square leg and they take couple of runs
full toss on the stumps, batsman drives it away to sweeper cover
defended on the back-foot to mid-wicket
punched on the back-foot back to the bowler, Trescothick backs up too far and Dilshan throws at the bowler's end but misses the stumps, anyway batsman dives into reach
short of length ball on the leg stump, turned away wide of the short-fine leg fielder
defended on the back-foot
full length ball, driven straight to mid-wicket

Breakthrough! full length delivery angled in, Trescothick move across a long way exposing the stumps and goes for the sweep, gets beaten by the full length and ball hits the leg stump, ambitious shot from Trescothick brings his downfall!
defended on the front-foot to offside
defended on the back-foot to offside
good length ball on the off stump, defended on the front-foot
full length ball on the stumps, batsman drives it away to mid-wicket
off the pads and ball rolls away to square leg
short ball outside off stump, batsman cuts it away late to thirdman for a couple of runs
defended on the front-foot to offside
good length ball on the off stump, driven to long-on
full length ball on the off stump, driven to long-on
half-volley, batsman drives it away straight to mid-wicket
short ball outside off stump, cut away to point fielder
full length ball on the stumps, batsman fails to put it away, drives straight again to mid-wicket
turning in, driven off the back-foot to the long-on region
fuller and flatter, just anlged in, Dalrymple says back and punches it down to long-on for an easy single
driven away off the back-foot, straight to Dilshan at cover
driven straight to the man at midwicket
defended outside the off stump and the ball rolls away towards cover point, quick single taken
on the stumps, driven away towards midwicket - another good over for Sri Lanka comes to an end
turned away off the pads to short fine leg
defended down on the off side
comes down the track and drives it away towards midwicket, diving half-stop from the Sri Lankan captain saves runs but fails to cut of the single
comes down the track to the pitch of the delivery and drives it down to long-on
tossed up, once again Dalrymple dances down the track and punches it down to long-on, just a single
defended outside the off stump
starts off with a quick delivery, driven off the back-foot to midwicket
driven down to long-on for an easy single

comes down the track and lofts it in the air to the long-on region, Arnold moves in quickly from the deep, it looked like he had it covered but after doing all the hard work he fumlbes a farily easy chance - what a left-off!
goes for the reverse sweep and connects well, takes on the fielder at short fine leg and add a single to the total
charges down the track and Jayasuriya fires it in cramping Dalrymple but he somehow manages it force it away towards cover
swept away to deep square leg, easy single to end the over
driven down to long-off for a single
punched down to long-on, again just a single there
slightly short and turning in, Jones quickly goes back and cuts it away to deep cover for a single
comes down the track, nicely gets to the pitch of the delivery and drives it down to long-on
Jones too comes down the track, nicely gets to the pitch of the delivery and chips it over the bowler for a brace
cut away off the back-foot to sweeper cover
swept away well wide of the fielder at short fine leg, bit of edge involved
goes for the reverse sweep and makes good contact, ball beats the fielder to the third man fence, that's a welcome boundary
doosra, swept away to deep square leg
worked away off the pads and the ball rolls away behind square on the leg side
under pressure Murali drags it short and Dalrymple cuts it away through point for a brace
comes down the track and chips it over the bowler, two more added

another nail goes in! short ball on the stumps and Jones pulls it away towards deep midwicket, Kapugedera moves across quickly to his left and snaffles it cleanly, deliberately took on the fielder in the deep.
defended outside the off stump
driven down to long-on and that's his fifty
driven away off the back-foot and gets it past the fielder at mid-on
driven straight back past the bowler, takes on the fielder in the deep and makes it back for the second
starts off with a doosra, defended watchfully
swept away to deep midwicket
again swept away to deep square leg, fumble in the deep and the batsmen steal an extra run
driven back to the bowler, this time Murali fails to stop it cleanly and the batsmen cross over
quicker delivery outside the off stump and the edge is produced, Sangakkara makes no mistake but umpire Llong is not convinced!
swept away for a single, they are running through the overs here
driven down to long-on
on the stumps, again driven down to long-on for a single
beaten for pace and Bresnan gets hit on the pad
defended back to the bowler
fulltoss, was there to be hit but Bresnan only manages to clip it away to deep midwicket
good length delivery, off-cutter, Bresnan goes for the drive, ball clips the inside edge and rolls away towards square leg

shot! good length delivery outside the off stump, Dalrymple pushes forward, gets close to the line and drills it through the gap between mid-off and cover, it's a no-ball as well, so five runs added to the total
good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, defended on the front-foot

good length delivery, this one nipped back in shaprly, ball clips the inside edge, crashes into the pad and rolls away on the off side, quick single called for and Fernando follows it up but he fails to pick it up cleanly and Bresnan makes it across safely
short of a good length delivery, cutting in from outside the off stump, Bresnan goes for the pull and the ball balloons up off the top-edge but falls safely in the deep
good length delivery outside the off stump, Dalrymple drives eyeing the cover region, ball clips the inside edge and crashes into the pad, another quick single added to the total
tight delivery, driven straight to Jayawardene at cover
fulltoss on the stumps, Dalrymple hits it hard into the ground and the ball bounces over the bowler
quicker and flatter, a classic Jayasuriya delivery, Bresnan goes for the sweep and gets hit on the pad, looked close but umpire Hair is not impressed
driven down to long-on
eased away on the leg side
driven wide of the fielder at midwicket
tossed up outside the off stump and Bresnan lofts it over the fielder at cover, clean hit
goes for the reverse sweep and gets it away towards point
driven down to long-on
tossed up on the middle and off stump line, nicely swept away but only a single added
fraction short and that's cut away through cover point
defended outside the off stump
slightly short and close to the off stump line, Dalrymple backs away and cuts hard but fails to make contact
good length delivery on the middle and leg stump line, hint of reverse swing, Bresnan leans forward and drives it wide of the fielder at mid-on
good length delivery outside the off stump, driven down to long-on for an easy single
fulltoss on the stumps, Bresnan swing across the line, misses the target by a long way and the ball hits the base of the middle stump, crucial wicket this!
fuller length delivery outside the off stump, probably the yorker gone wrong, Mahamood has a go at it but misses the target by miles
makes room and drives it wide of Jayasuriya at deep cover
fuller length delivery outside the off stump, Mahmood once again drives well through cover but this time the ball goes straight to Jayasuriya in the deep
turned away off the back-foot to deep midwicket, takes on the fielder in the deep and comfortably comes back for the second
short and wide outside the off stump, looked like the ball slipped out, Mahmood drives awkwardly and the ball rolls down to long-off

England's slump continues! flatter trajectory, pitched outside the off stump and turning in, Dalrymple goes down on one knee in an attempt to slog it over the midwicket fence but is bit early into the shot and the ball crashes into the stumps, the ball nicely gripped the surface and turned in slowly and Dalrymple was beaten by the lack of pace there , end of a good innings from the debutant
fuller length delivery outside the off stump, driven down to long-on for a brace
well bowled doosra and Plunkett is comprehensively beaten
worked away on the leg side, easy single to end the over
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, Plunkett steps forward and goes for the pull, ball zips past the outside edge
fuller length delivery, Malinga working up good pace here, Plunkett ends up driving it back to the bowler
slightly short and that's pulled away towards deep midwicket for a single
driven down to long-off, gets it wide of the fielder in the deep and the comfortably come back for the second

good length delivery, nothing special there, just a wicket to wicket delivery, Mahmood comes down the track and has a wild swing at it, a typical tail-enders slog, short story shorter - Mahmood misses and Malinga hits, as simple as that
full and speared in on the stumps, a well bowled yorker, Harmison somehow manages to dig it out
short of a good length delivery, angled in from wide of the crease, Plunkett pulls and pulls well - ball flies away to the midwicket fence - keep them coming!
good length delivery outside the off stump, Plunkett drives off the back-foot and the ball flies over the fielder at point, there was a run out in the offing but the Lankans failed to capatilise.
good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, driven straight to Murali at midwicket - just a single there
fulltoss outside the off stump, driven down to long-off for a single

short of a good length delivery, this one nipped back in shaprly, Plunkett once again goes for the pull, probably looking to clear the midwicket fence but on this occasion he failed to make contact and the ball went through to the keeper
driven to long-off, another single added to the total
driven down to long-on, just a single
good length delivery, Malinga keeping it wicket to wicket, Harmison gets behind the line and punches it down to long-on, runs hard and comes back for the second
again driven down to long-on, the writing is on the wall I guess
fulltoss on the pads, Plunkett looking to flick it away on the leg side failes to connect and the ball rolls away off the pad
way outside the off stump and that's rightly called a wide
good length delivery, straight and on the stumps, Harmison makes room and lofts it away to deep cover
full and on the stumps, no room offered and Plunkett is made to drive straight, just a single down to long-on
